#include<stdio.h>
inline int inp()
    {
    int noRead=0;
    char p=getchar_unlocked();
    for(;p<33;){p=getchar_unlocked();};
    while(p>32)
    {
    noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
    p=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return noRead;
    };
int main()
{
    int t,m;
    t=inp();
    while(t--)
    {
        m=inp();
        if(m==1) printf("0\n");
        else
        {
            if(m%2==0) printf("%lld\n",(long long int)m*(m/2)-1);
            else printf("%lld\n",(long long int)(m/2)*(m+1)-1);
    	}
    }
    return 0;
}
